title: Odd Custom Game On OCE
body:
Well This Probably Isn't Anything Major But A friend and i noticed something a bit odd in the OCE custom games lobby its a game titled 'no ganks till420's game
The guy who is hosting the game goes by the name "Underverse" and he hasn't played since Jan 10  but his game is still open
meaning this has been a guy sitting here for a week not doing anything i thought lol logged you out automatically if you are inactive for a certain amount of time

i doubt its anything major just wanted to point out my concerns

replies.body: Weird. I've seen it too. Does he actually play games?
I dunno but since i made this post he seems to have disappeared
Yea ill be honest im a little sppoked by it
